Forceful Response.name: Forceful Response
Forceful Response.flavor: You channel Avandra’s energy to strike back at a foe that has wounded you, emboldening your future actions against this foe.
Forceful Response.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you hits you with an attack.
Forceful Response.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier force damage, and you knock the target prone. Additionally, the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Bold Invitation.name: Bold Invitation
Bold Invitation.flavor: You blast a foe with divine energy, forcing it to meet you in battle and bolstering yourself with Avandra’s protection.
Bold Invitation.onHit: 4d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you can teleport the target to a square adjacent to you.
Bold Invitation.onMiss: Half damage, and you pull the target up to 2 squares.
Bold Invitation.effect: You gain a +2 bonus to all defenses against attacks made by the target until the end of your next turn.

Share Avandra's Favor.name: Share Avandra's Favor
Share Avandra's Favor.flavor: You grant Avandra’s favor to one of your friends.
Share Avandra's Favor.target: One bloodied ally in the burst
Share Avandra's Favor.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target gains a +4 power bonus to all defenses.
